r.d: This extension embeds Google's V8 Javascript Engine into PHP.
r.n:
- allow to pass generators from PHP to JS and vice versa
Merge improvements from V8Js for PHP 5.x (version 0.5.0) to PHP 7.0 branch: - Export public methods on classes derived from \V8Js to V8 - Support V8 compiled with external snapshots - Allow to create custom snapshots of V8 heaps - Allow to create V8 contexts based on custom snapshots generated earlier - Support V8 5.1 well
